Table.LabelHead: <form id="form{pubid/}" action="/PubAction.aspx"> <input type="hidden" name="PubID" id="PubID" value="{pubid/}" /> <input type="hidden" name="PubContentid" id="PubContentid" value="{PubContentid/}" /> <input type="hidden" name="scoreVal" id="scoreVal" /> <style type="text/css"> .starImg {display:inline-block;width:110px;height:22px;background:url(/App_Themes/Microblog/images/star_org3.gif);cursor:pointer;} </style>
Table.LoopContent: {opName/}
Table.LabelFoot:
<input type="submit" value="提交" onclick="starSub(this);";/>
              <script type="text/javascript">
                  $().ready(function () {
                      $(".starSpan").click(function () { $(this).find(":radio")[0].checked = true; });
                      var v = "";
                      $(".totalDiv label").each(function () { v += $(this).text() + ","; });
                      $.ajax({
                          type: "Post",
                          url: "/PubAction.aspx",
                          data: { action: "GetScore1", value: v, "pubID": {pubid/}, "cid": "{PubContentid/}" },//内容ID
                          async: true,
                          dataType: "json",
                          success: function (data)
                          {
                              var result =  $(".totalDiv").html();
                              for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++)
                              {
                                  result=result.replace(data[i].s, data[i].v);
                              }
                              $(".totalDiv").html(result).show();
                          },
                          error: function (data){}
                      });
                  });
                  function starSub(obj) {
                      var result = "";
                      radioArr = $(obj).parent().find("input:radio:checked");
                      for (var i = 0; i < radioArr.length; i++) {
                          result += $(radioArr[i]).attr("name") + ":" + $(radioArr[i]).val() + ",";
                      }
                      $(obj).parent().find("#scoreVal").val(result);
                      $(obj).parent().find("#scoreVal").val();
                  }
        </script>
